channel.title: R on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in R on A Hugo website

item.title: 2021 March Madness follow-up
item.description: I am going to be looking back at my March Madness picks from a few weeks ago and see where I went wrong in some of my predictions from my XGBoost model. I finished 14th out of 17 people in our classes ESPN NCAA Tournemnent challenge. I was not last but I was far from the top. My XGBoost model bracket was only better than about 20 percent of the other brackets made on ESPN this year.
